name: Covenant
description:
'''Covenant''' is a Swedish [[electronic music|electronic]] band formed in [[Helsingborg Municipality|Helsingborg]] in 1986. The band is currently composed of Eskil Simonsson and Joakim Montelius in the studio, while live shows consist of Simonsson along with touring members Chad Hauger,  Daniel Jonasson, Andreas Catjar and Daniel Myer of [[Haujobb]].

Their music comprises a mixture of [[synthpop]] and [[electronic body music]]. They have been releasing music since the early 1990s.
